Title: Davenport
Status: IA City Council: Stop Fluoridating Our Water
Targets:
We have found:

1) In Davenport the type of fluoride cited in the 1952 Agreement - pharmaceutical-grade sodium fluoride - has been replaced with industrial-grade hydrofluorosilicic acid a toxic substance contaminated with chemicals including arsenic and barium;
2) A World Health Organization (WHO) study shows no difference in cavity rates in fluoridated and non-fluoridated areas;
3) Ninety-seven percent of Western Europe has chosen fluoride-free water;
4) Fluoride is the only chemical added to drinking water for 'medication;'
5) Fluoridated water is no longer recommended for infants;
6) Ingestion of fluoride has been linked to thyroid problems osteosarcoma (bone cancer) dental & skeletal fluorosis and reduced IQ;
7) Fluoridation poses added burden and risk to low-income communities;
8) Due to other sources many people are being over-exposed to fluoride;
9) Dosage is not being controlled;
10) Fluoride is added to our drinking water without informed consent i.e. the dangers of fluoridation are not addressed to the users of the Davenport Water System;

It is our choice what we put into our bodies.

Therefore we the undersigned - residents business owners and people who visit and conduct business in the City of Davenport IA - ask that the City Council introduces for a vote the issue of 'Elimination of Fluoride in the Davenport Municipal Drinking Water.'
